attributes.action: Bring back restaurants drink refills and bring back buy one get one free
attributes.additional_details: Free refills and BOGO offers encourage people to visit more often, share meals with friends and family, and enjoy their favorite spots without breaking the bank.
attributes.background: Bring back restaurant refills and buy-one-get-one-free deals because they represent real value and appreciation for customers. These simple perks make dining out feel more rewarding and affordable, especially at a time when prices seem to be rising everywhere.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Revoke regulations that restrict promotion of high sugar/fat food and drink
